videos.title: 🔍 Master Constants in GoLang for Interviews | Full Deep Dive 💡
videos.description:
🧠 Master the concept of *Constants* in Go (Golang) with this **comprehensive interview-focused video**. Whether you're preparing for your next backend developer interview or brushing up on Go fundamentals, this video covers everything you need:

📌 **Topics Covered:**
- ✅ What is a Constant?
- 📜 Syntax and Declaration
- 🧠 Typed vs Untyped Constants
- 🧩 Constant Grouping & Best Practices
- 🔄 Constants vs Variables
- 💬 Real-world examples and interview tips

👨‍💻 Perfect For:
- GoLang Interview Preparation
- CS Students & Backend Engineers
- Developers Revising Go Fundamentals

⏱️ Stay till the end for bonus **interview tricks** and **common mistakes to avoid**.

🔔 Subscribe for more:
#GoLang #BackendDeveloper #ProgrammingInterview #GolangConstants #CodingTips #GoProgramming #TechCareers #SoftwareEngineer #DeveloperInterview #CodeWithDhruv
